title: Manipur Old Age Pension Scheme
beneficiary: Old aged persons, destitute, widows who don't have any income or sources of income, either of his own or anyone else who is legally liable to support him or her. If both husband and wife are destitute, each one of them shall be eligible for pension. Widows who don't have any source of income including income from property owned by her or who has an earning brother are eligible for the pension.
benefits: With the rate of Rs. 1500/- per month
howToApply: For details, please visit department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul

title: Child Protection Services(CPS), Scheme “MISSION VATSALYA”
beneficiary: Children in need of care and protection (CNCP) • Abused child, Child labor, Orphans, Abandoned • Homeless or without minimal means of subsistence • Neglected or in a reasonable likelihood of being harmed • Physically / mentally challenged or terminally ill • Trafficking and drug abuse victim • Sexual abuse and exploitation victim • Victim of armed conflict, civil commotion or natural calamity etc Child in conflict with law (CCL) • alleged to have committed an offence
benefits: • creating a system to protect children based on the cardinal principles of “protection of child rights” and “best interest of the child”, • improvements in the well being of children in difficult circumstances • Reduction of vulnerabilities to situations and actions that lead to abuse, neglect, exploitation, abandonment and separation of children from their families.
howToApply: For more details, please vist Department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul

title: National Social Assistance Programme(NSAP)
beneficiary: There are 4(four) component under NSAP. The assistance under the sub-schemes of NSAP are applicable for persons belonging to Below Poverty Line (BPL) category. a) Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS) Eligibility criteria: 60 Years and above b) Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS) Eligibility criteria: The eligible age is 40 years and above BPL Widows. c) Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS) Eligibility criteria: The eligible age for the pensioner is 18 years and above and the disability level has to be 80%.. d) National Family Benefit Scheme
benefits: Eligibility Criteria: Rs. 20000/- will be given as a lumpsum assistance to the bereaved household in the event of death of the bread-winner. It is clarified that any event of death (natural or otherwise) would make the family eligible for assistance. A woman in the family, who is a home maker, is also considered as a ‘bread-winner’ for this purpose.
howToApply: For more details, please visit department of Social Welfare, DC Complex, Ukhrul

title: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)
beneficiary: 272 nos. of widow persons were benefitted in respect of Ukhrul District.
benefits: The scheme is under NSAP and provides a scale of benefit @ Rs 300/- per month to the widow persons living below poverty line within the age of 40-59 years
howToApply: The widow persons living below poverty line within the age of 40-59 years may visit the District Social Welfare Office, Ukhrul for further details

title: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
benefits: The scale of benefit is Rs. 200/- per months, however under IGNOAPS-Rs. 200- per month in the age group of 60 to 79 years and Rs. 500/- per month for the persons in the age group of 80 years and above.
howToApply:
In case of IGNOAPS, the age of the applicant shall be a minimum of 60 years, earlier it was 65 years. Under MOAPS, the age of the applicant shall be 55 years in case of female, 60 years in case of male .
The eligible applicants may visit the District Social Welfare Office, Ukhrul
